comment.realname: Adam and Debbie Purser Classic Sailing
comment.author: 21121256@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Classic Sailing's - Tall Ships and Traditional Vessels, and we'd love to have this added to the group! It would be wonderful if you could any of your other fantastic historic photogrpahs to this group.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Nautical Art, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: Will you add this view of what the docks were built to receive to the group called Historical Engineering Works of Britain and Ireland ?
